text: Purchase of machine of #50,000 was debited to purchase account,This is an error of ?
explanation: Error of principle occurs when a transaction in the wrong class of account.

text: The accounting treatment for each withdrawn by the owner of a business for private use is?
explanation: The accounting treatment for cash withdrawn for personally use is dr: drawings a/c and cr: cash a/c

text: The source document used to prepare the purchases day book is?
explanation: The invoice is the ultimate form of document for preparing purchase day book.

text: A balance sheet shows

options.B: The difference between fixed assets and current liabilities
options.C: Assets and  sources of financing them

explanation: This is an expression of assets = capital+ liabilities ,this shows assets as claims against the assets

text: Discount received is posted on the credit side of
explanation: Discount received is an income,thus,it will show on the credit side of the profit and loss account

text: Matching concept in accounting is the basis of
explanation: Matching concept is a concept that states that income and expenses should matched with the year in which they are incurred.

text:
Use the following information to answer questions 10-12
A motor vehicle bought for #1,600,000 was estimated to have a useful life span of 4 years and a residual value of #200,000. The straight line method of calculating depreciation is used.The motor vehicle is sold at the end of the fourth year for #250,000.
The net value book value of the end of the fourth year is
explanation:
Depreciation = (Cost - scrap value)/4
= #1,600,000-#200,000/4 = #350,000
Depreciation for 3yrs
= #350,000 × 3 = 1,050,000
Net book value at the end of the third year
=1,600,000 - 1,050,000 = #550,000

text: The accumulated depreciation at the end of the second year is 350,000 × 2 = 700,000
explanation: Accumulated depreciation at the end of the second year is

text: The asset disposal account at the end fo the third year is
explanation: click here

text: The amount earned but is yet to be received at the end of the financial period is
explanation: Accrued income is income due but not yet paid

text: The method of stock valuation which overstates profit during inflation is
explanation: A  FIFO overstates profit during inflation period.

text: An item recorded in the debit side of the trial balance is
explanation: Expenses and assets appear in the debit side of the trial balance.

text: Prepayments are shown in the balance sheet as
explanation: Prepayments are expenses paid but not yet used,it is an asset to the company

text: A petty cashier has a cash float of #53,000 and #38,600 was spent,the reimbursement would be
explanation: The petty cashier is always reimbursed with the amount spent.

text: A person whom a business owes for the goods or service supplied by him is the
explanation: If a business owns its suppliers for goods and services supplied,the supplier is a creditor.

text: Purchases for #12,960 was recorded in the day book as #12,690. This is an error of
explanation: This is an error of original entry because it was commited when the entry was made.

text:
Which of the following features describe a receipts and payments account 

i it is a nominal account
ii it contains only items of revenue
iii it is a real account
iv it records capital expenditure items
explanation: The receipt and the payment account just like the cash account,its a real account and can record both capital and revenue expenditures and receipts.

text: Sales of goods to the value of N500 was debited to Ade instead of Adu, The journal entry for correcting this error is debit

options.B: Ades Account #500; credit Adus account N 500

explanation: This is an error of commission,it is usually corrected with the reverse of the error.

text: The book of original entry for recording cash sales is
explanation: Cash book is the book of original entry for recording any cash transaction.

text: A self balancing ledger is
explanation: After appropriating all transactions to their places ,the appropriation account balance off

text: Subscription in advance is treated in the balance sheet as an item under
explanation: Subscription in advance are undue income that is already paid,it is a current liability to the company

The word limited written after the name of a company means that the.

options.B: Members are liable to the extent of their holdings

explanation: The word limited at the end of the company's name indicates that the liability of members is limited to the capital contributed

text: Which of the following factors can make an entrepreneur successful?

text: The excess of the assets of a business over its liabilities is
explanation: The accounting equation states that capital + liabilities = assets.

text: The three column cash book differs from the two column cash book in that it has
explanation: The discount column is the only thing that differentiates a two column cash book from three column cash book.
